Metadata.name: Detailed Descriptions
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
Adds improved information to many game descriptions:
-S. Link locations and availability -S. Link social stat requirements
-Key item descriptions -Seedling descriptions (time to harvest, item effect)
-Skill Card functions -Auto-Skill effects -Auto-Skill duration
-Quest drop information (enemy type, enemy location) -Quest deadlines -Quest requirements -Quest objectives
